name: Space Marines
description: The Space Marines are the most elite and feared fighting forces of the Imperium.

squads.name: Tactical Squad
squads.description: Tactical Squads are the backbone of any Space Marine army. They hold ground; provide fire support; and even attack enemy lines.

squads.name: Assault Squad
squads.description: Assault Squads make up the bulk of most Space Marine Chapters' assault forces.

squads.name: Devastator Squad
squads.description: Devastator Squads provide a Space Marine Chapter with heavy fire support.

name: Astra Militarum
description: The Astra Militarum, also known as the Imperial Guard, is the largest coherent fighting force in the galaxy.

squads.name: Infantry Squad
squads.description: The Infantry Squad is the backbone of the Astra Militarum, and is invariably the most commonly deployed type of soldier.

squads.name: Heavy Weapons Squad
squads.description: Heavy Weapons Squads provide fire support for Astra Militarum infantry units.

squads.name: Special Weapons Squad
squads.description: Special Weapons Squads are part of the Astra Militarum's specialized infantry and are tasked with carrying the regiment's heavy weaponry.

name: Chaos Space Marines
description: Chaos Space Marines are Space Marines who turned to Chaos during the Horus Heresy, the civil war that almost tore the Imperium apart ten thousand years ago.

squads.name: Chaos Cultists
squads.description: Chaos Cultists are the most numerous of the Chaos Space Marines' warbands. They are the foot soldiers of Chaos, cannon fodder for the Dark Gods.

squads.name: Chaos Space Marines
squads.description: Chaos Space Marines are the mainstay of any Chaos army. They are the fallen brethren of the loyalist Space Marines.

squads.name: Chaos Terminators
squads.description: Chaos Terminators are the very elite of a Chaos Space Marine warband. Clad in Tactical Dreadnought Armour, they are almost invulnerable to all but the most potent weaponry.
